name: Software Inventory Audit Tool (SIAT)

screenshots.caption: Software Inventory Audit Tool - Main tab
Software Inventory Audit Tool - Software Classification

short_description:
Features are: Import of inventory from OCS Inventory NG,  management of licenses, perdforming of an audit, export of simple reports  in excel spreadsheets.
This tool is basic and designed to ease the life of IT management for analyzis/audit after full inventory of the software assets.

Features:
- import of machines, software list and inventory from OCS Inventory NG server
- Classification of software (by type of licensing)
- Management of licenses ownership
- Audit : Assignment of licenses to installed software instances from the inventory, export of reports in excel format

This is a very simple utility that has not be designed for huge assets management. It has been used and worked correctly 20-machines network, and might need to be redesigned for bigger ones.

This tool has been developped as an internship project for Integral Systems Europe company by Denis Consiglio. Integral Systems Europe decided to release the software in Open Source for good of community.
summary: Simple Tool for performing audit from a software inventory
